name: practice-project
description: ![](poster.png) # RESTful Quiz Service * Login and Registering System * Users can create quizzes and upload an image to the quiz * Users can add questions to their own quizzes * Users can modify and delete their own quizzes * Other users can take a quizzes from other users and answer the questions * Users cannot take a quiz more than once * Users can see the score they got after taking a quiz * The web services is RESTful
